resource.title: Breathing practice 1-2-3
resource.subtitle: Follow the prompts and stay curious about sensations.
resource.complete: Practice complete. Notice how you feel.
companion.title: AI Companion
companion.subtitle: Share how you feel or pick a quick prompt.
companion.placeholder: e.g. I'm anxious before a meeting
companion.locked: Sign in via Telegram Mini App or verify email to use the companion.
companion.noResponse: A gentle reply will appear here.
companion.prompt.breathe: I'm nervous—remind me about the 1-2-3 breathing.
companion.prompt.anxiety: I'm feeling anxious and need a supportive message.
companion.prompt.focus: Help me focus on what matters now.
companion.toast.rate: Too many requests. Try again soon.
companion.toast.limit: Today's budget is spent. Companion switched offline.
emotions.title: Log an emotion
emotions.subtitle: Pick a feeling and set its intensity.
journal.title: Journal entry
journal.subtitle: 1–3 sentences help track the mood.
science.title: Science & practice
science.body1: Mindful breathing toggles the nervous system into safety. The 1-2-3 pattern slows the pulse and anchors you in the body.
science.body2: Logging feelings and short notes reveals mood cycles and support clues. Three minutes a day grow a steady self-care habit.
footer: SoznAi runs both as a Telegram Mini App and an offline-friendly web UI.
toast.selectEmotion: Choose an emotion from the grid
toast.journalHint: Add a couple of sentences about how you feel
toast.authRequired: Authorisation required. Open in Telegram or confirm via email.
